partner_data.longDescription:
BMC and Microsoft have a long history of partnering to provide innovative Digital Enterprise Management solutions that optimize customer investments in Microsoft operating systems, applications, and database platforms. Together BMC and Microsoft:

  • Enable customers to manage digital services delivery, consumption, operations, planning, and compliance across multi-platform, multi-vendor infrastructures
  • Provide customers management of the MSFT infrastructure as a part of a complete, heterogeneous ITILÂ® environment
  • Provide customers with choice of a server hypervisor platform through enhanced BMC support
  • Deliver early adopter support of new versions of MSFT operating systems, databases, and applications
  • Offer faster time-to-value with pre-configured integrations
partner_data.name: Microsoft
partner_data.shortDescription: BMC and Microsoft partner to provide innovative Digital Enterprise Management solutions that optimize customer investments in Microsoft operating systems, applications, and database platforms.
